1. Town Council

Mayor & Town Council
====================

![Town Council](https://www.townofsunnyvale.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6484)

The Sunnyvale Town Council consists of six members and a Mayor.

* [Saji George - Mayor - Email](mailto:mayor.george@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Ryan Finch - Mayor Pro-Tem/Council Member Place 1 - Email](mailto:councilmember.finch@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Kevin Clark - Council Member Place 2 - Email](mailto:councilmember.clark@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Manu Danny - Council Member Place 3 - Email](mailto:manu.danny@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Holly Garland - Council Member Place 4 - Email](mailto:holly.garland@townofsunnyvale.org "Council member - Jim Wade")
* [Larry Allen - Council Member Place 5 - Email](mailto:councilmember.allen@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Dr. George Woodrow Jr. - Council Member](mailto:george.woodrow@townofsunnyvale.org)
  [Place 6 - Email](mailto:councilmember.freeman@townofsunnyvale.org)

The Town Council holds regular public meetings at 7 p.m. on the second and fourth Monday of each month in the Council Chambers, located at Town Hall 127 N. Collins Rd, Sunnyvale, TX 75182.

The Town Council welcomes you to speak on any agenda item, but respectfully requests that a
Public Meeting Appearance Card
be completed and submitted to the Town Secretary prior to the Council meeting by email or in-person before the meeting begins. This information is required by law to be included as part of the official record.
